abstract: From the Baltic to the Mediterranean, small, local banks like Turkiye Garanti Bankasi are stepping in to finance corporate buyouts as big banks grapple with the running credit crisis.
snippet: From the Baltic to the Mediterranean, small, local banks like Turkiye Garanti Bankasi are stepping in to finance corporate buyouts as big banks grapple with the running credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Turkiye Garanti Bankasi is on no one’s list of global financial heavyweights. But the Turkish bank is going where the mightiest banks on Wall Street fear to tread.

headline.main: Offering Money Where the Big Banks Won’t
headline.print_headline: Wall St.’s Pullback on Financing Creates Openings for Europe’s Smaller Banks
